about.title: About Us
about.description: Learn more about Sayings and our mission to share wisdom.
about.missionText: At Sayings, we believe in the power of words to inspire, motivate, and transform lives. Our mission is to collect and share the wisdom of the world's greatest thinkers, making it accessible to everyone.
about.storyText: Sayings was founded in 2023 by a group of literature enthusiasts who wanted to create a platform where people could discover and share inspirational quotes. What started as a small collection has grown into a comprehensive library of wisdom from diverse authors across different cultures and time periods.
about.value1Text: We verify all quotes to ensure they are correctly attributed and accurately represented.
about.value2Text: We strive to include diverse voices and perspectives from around the world.
about.value3Text: We believe wisdom should be accessible to everyone, regardless of language or background.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your information.
privacy.introductionText: This Privacy Policy explains how Sayings collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our website.
privacy.informationWeCollectText: We may collect personal information such as your name and email address when you contact us or sign up for our newsletter. We also collect usage data to improve our service.
privacy.howWeUseInformationText: We use your information to provide and improve our service, respond to your inquiries, and send you updates if you've subscribed to our newsletter.
privacy.cookiesText: We use cookies to enhance your experience on our website. You can set your browser to refuse all or some browser cookies, but this may affect some functionality.
privacy.dataProtectionText: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy.thirdPartyLinksText: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these websites.
privacy.changesPolicyText: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
